segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he’s going to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much of a mess this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
